quote_last: “What in—” Armont emitted a curse as all hell broke loose behind them. A fusillade of automatic-weapons fire rained around, from somewhere in the direction of the shoreline.
title: Project Cyclops
author: Thomas Hoover

quote_first: The clock on the dashboard said it was
quote_last: . He left the keys in the car, and walked toward the tree.
title: American Gods
author: Neil Gaiman
